food.question: I am long and yellow. Monkeys love to peel and eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I grow on trees
💛 My color is bright and sunny
🍌 I'm curved like a smile

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. I can be poured on cereal. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 You can drink me cold
🐄 I come from an animal
🦴 I'm good for your bones

food.question: I am round and red. I grow on trees and keep the doctor away. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 I am a common fruit
🥧 You can make a pie with me
🌱 I have seeds in my core

food.question: I am orange and crunchy. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am a root vegetable
🐰 A certain animal is famous for eating me
🌱 I grow underground

food.question: I am small, round, and juicy. I grow in bunches on a vine. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I can be green, red, or purple
🍷 I am used to make juice and wine
🧺 I grow in clusters

food.question: I am made from flour, water, and yeast. I am often sliced and toasted. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 People eat me with butter or jam
🔥 I can be baked in an oven
🌾 I am made from grain

food.question: I am a yellow spread made from soybeans. I'm a good source of protein, and I'm often on sandwiches. What am I?

hints.text: 🥪 I'm a popular sandwich filling
🌱 I'm vegetarian friendly
🥜 I'm similar to peanut butter, but not quite!

food.question: I am a vegetable that looks like a tiny tree. Some people like to dip me in ranch dressing. What am I?

hints.text: 🥦 I am green
🌳 My shape is similar to a smaller version of another plant
🥗 I am healthy to eat raw or cooked

food.question: I am a sweet treat with a crispy shell and a soft, gooey inside. Some say that it has been made with almonds, coconuts and vanilla. What am I?

hints.text: 🥚 I am often found near the coffee
🍪 Some people consider me to be a cookie but I am not
🍫 They say that I can be made with dark chocolate

food.question: I am a dish that consists of seasoned rice and various ingredients such as vegetables, meat, or seafood, all cooked together in a special pan. What am I?

hints.text: 🥘 I am a national dish from Spain
🍋 Some people add lemon to me
🔥 I am cooked on a traditional pan with two handles

plant.question: I have roots, but no legs. I wear green, but have no clothes. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I need sunshine and water to grow
🌳 Birds like to build nests in me
🍃 I can be very tall!

plant.question: I am a colorful plant that bees love to visit. What am I?

hints.text: 🌷 I can be red, yellow, pink, or purple
🐝 Bees collect nectar from me
💐 People often give me as a gift

plant.question: I grow underground and am orange and crunchy. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I'm a type of root
🐰 Bugs Bunny loves to eat me
💪 I am good for your eyes!

plant.question: I am a plant that is tall and has a thick, brown trunk. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I'm made of wood
🐿️ Squirrels like to climb me
🍁 I can lose my leaves in the fall.

plant.question: I'm green and leafy, and you can eat me in a salad. What am I?

hints.text: 🥗 I go well with dressing
🥬 There are many different types of me, like romaine and iceberg
🐰 Some animals, like rabbits, love to eat me.

plant.question: I’m a plant that likes to climb, and I often have purple or white flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 💜 My flowers smell sweet
🏡 I can grow on a fence or wall
🦋 Butterflies and hummingbirds love me

plant.question: I grow in the ground, have a bumpy skin, and am often mashed. What am I?

hints.text: 🥔 People make fries out of me
🍽️ I am a starchy vegetable
🌎 I grow under the soil

plant.question: I am a tall plant with yellow kernels that can be popped. What am I?

hints.text: 🍿 People eat me at the movies
🌽 I grow on a cob
🐔 Animals eat me on a farm

plant.question: I am a plant with prickly thorns and beautiful, fragrant flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 🥀 I am often given as a symbol of love
🌹 I can be red, pink, white, or yellow
🧤 Be careful when you hold me, I have thorns!

plant.question: I am a plant that is very old and wise. I can live for hundreds of years and provide shelter. What am I?

hints.text: 🦉 Owls like to live in me
🌳 My rings tell how old I am
🐿 I can be home to many creatures.
